doc.title: Fukuichi Japanese Restaurant: To Freeze or not to Freeze?

Raw/JJ fish/NN ,/, especially/RB fresh/JJ water/NN fish/NN ,/, can/MD potentially/RB harbor/VB parasites/NNS ./.
